channel.title: Tip : If you have a router, and your ip banned
channel.description:
Before you read : THIS THREAD WILL NOT WORK IF YOUR PERM BANNED
Because you are on a router, and also you are ip banned, i think runescape may be a little dumb. Because you can easily reset your router to change your ip address, yet this saves because else you would have to move house or play somewhere else.
So when you get IP banned, reset your router to change your IP address

item.title: Tip : If you have a router, and your ip banned
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Yeeah, but if your IP banned, you can’t even connect to the site I think.

Read full topic
